name: 3-hour prototype - Magnet puzzle platformer
description:
THE PREMISE:

You're a legally distinct Wil E. Coyote knockoff in search of your missing dynamite! Fortunately, you remembered to bring your electromagnet to help you out!

Controls are explained in the game itself. Use your magnet to move metal objects and pass various obstacles. Don't fall into the toxic purple sludge!

Github repository

This game was created by just two people for an extremely quick 3-hour game jam, with the theme 'Attraction'. It's not the most stable or complete experience, but we're sure you'll still have fun with it! Builds are available for Windows, Mac and Linux, but the latter two are untested because we don't presently have access to those types of machines.

CREDITS:

Code and game assembly: Marcus Mouyat (me)
